Retrieved on 31 March 2007. â€“ 29 July 2020) Zimbabwean air officer and government official. He was Minister of Lands, Agriculture and Rural Resettlement in the Cabinet of Zimbabwe from 1 December 2017 until his death in 2020. He was the commander of the Air Force of Zimbabwe and member of the Joint Operations Command.Air Force of Zimbabwe , Zimbabwe Ministry of Defence. Retrieved on 31 March 2007. Shiri was a cousin of former President Robert Mugabe. He called himself "Black Jesus". Shiri died on 28 July 2020 from COVID-19 while hospitalized in Harare, aged 65. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Zimbabwean politicians Category:African military people Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Zimbabwe
